tool_description: REALTIME! #1 Most Hated API by Bookmakers: Competitions, Matches & Odds for betano. Available sports: Football (Soccer), Basketball, Ice Hockey, American Football, Tennis, Handball, Volleyball, Baseball, Cricket, Darts, Boxing, MMA, Rugby, Snooker, Table Tennis, Waterpolo, Futsal, Aussie Rules, Field Hockey, Floorball & Squash.
name: Betano
title: Betano

api_list.name: Sports
api_list.description: Retrieves all sports for Betano Sportsbook
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betano.p.rapidapi.com/allsports_betano"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betano.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Odds (historical)
api_list.description: Retrieves historical Odds for the selected match. Use the endpoint "Matches (historical)" first to get the correct input data for "matchid".

api_list.name: Python - Odds endpoint in Dataframe
api_list.description: This Code Snippet helps to bring a request from the Odds-endpoint into useful Dataframe format by pandas.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://betano.p.rapidapi.com/odds-python-dataframe_betano"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "betano.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Matches - (may take time)
api_list.description:
Retrieves all Matches in our system. As this endpoint is on demand, the first request of the day for the selected competition may take up to 30 seconds.
Use "matchid" for the endpoint "Odds".

required_parameters.name: match_urls
required_parameters.description: Links to each match by available bookmaker (true or false)

api_list.name: Competitions
api_list.description:
Retrieves all competitions in our system for the selected sport.
Remember to use the received credentials of each competition for the endpoint "Matches".

api_list.name: Matches (historical)
api_list.description:
Retrieves all historical Matches in our system. Take the endpoint "Competitions" as a reference for the input.
Use "matchid" for the endpoint "Odds (historical)".

api_list.name: Odds - (pre-game & live)
api_list.description: Retrieves real-time Odds for the selected match filtered for Betano Sportsbook. Use the endpoint "Matches" first to get the correct input data for "matchid".

api_list.name: Javascript - Odds endpoint in Node.js
api_list.description: This Code Snippet helps to bring a request from the Odds-endpoint into useful Node.js format via Javascript.
